thread.title: Bomber hits Maiduguri on New Year’s eve
thread.title_full: Bomber hits Maiduguri on New Year’s eve

author: Fatai Ibrahim
title: Bomber hits Maiduguri on New Year’s eve
text: Bomber hits Maiduguri on New Year’s eve January 1, 2017 tweet Kayode Idowu There was a suicide attack in Maiduguri, the Borno State capital on New Year’s Eve, according to the spokesman of the police in the state, Victor Isuku. Isiaku in a text message to our correspondent said, “Information reaching me now is that there was an explosion at custom area. “Preliminary details available is that only the suicide bomber affected. Now on standby for details soonest.” A resident of the area, Abba Mustapha said the bomb blast was at a tea drinking joint at customs area near the Nigerian Customs Service office. He said that many persons were killed in the explosion.
